title: How to Order the Free Rapid Covid-19 Tests Announced by the White House
sub_head: Americans can place orders for additional free Covid-19 tests via a website. What you need to know.
body:
Americans can now order additional free at-home rapid Covid-19 tests through a government website.
Beginning in January, every U.S. home was eligible to order four free at-home Covid-19 tests from the website. In March, President Biden announced in the State of the Union address that households that have already ordered the tests would be able to order four additional tests.
